channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Passengers start to feel bite of flight cuts amid US government shutdown
item.description: Travellers forced to adjust their plans as longest shutdown on record continues with no sign of resolution US politics live – latest updates A US gove...

item.title: Senate to hold 15th vote on ending record-breaking US government shutdown
item.description: Shutdown enters 38th day as US grapples with unprecedented disruptions to government programs US politics live – latest updates The US government shut...

item.title: Former British soldier accused of murdering Kenyan woman appears in court
item.description: Robert Purkiss faces extradition to Kenya to face charges after Agnes Wanjiru killed near army base in 2012 A man has appeared in court as extradition...

item.title: Flight cancellations take effect amid government shutdown – US politics live
item.description: Airlines had already started cutting services ahead of today’s 6am ET directive to reduce traffic at 40 major airports Andrew Roth in Washington and F...

item.title: Lammy promises ‘tough new release checks’ as missing prisoner arrested – UK politics live
item.description: Accidental release of Brahim Kaddour-Cherif had added to pressure on justice secretary after similar incident involving Epping sex offender Rachel Ree...

item.title: ITV in talks to sell television business to Sky
item.description: The talks focus on ITV's free-to-air channels as well as its streaming service, ITV X.

item.title: Woman who claimed to be Madeleine McCann found guilty of harassing family
item.description: Kate and Gerry McCann say, despite the guilty verdict, they "take no pleasure in the result."

item.title: Six officers face misconduct hearing over Cardiff triple death crash
item.description: A group of five people were reported missing before being found in a crashed car two days later.

item.title: Maccabi fan ban was due to hooliganism, say police
item.description: West Midlands Police did not previously reveal its reasons because "it wasn't deemed helpful".

item.title: From non-league to England call-up - who is 'Guernsey Grealish' Scott?
item.description: From the eighth tier of English football to the England squad - who is new Three Lions call-up Alex Scott?
